A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is the best Star Wars film since The Empire Strikes Back. Those who disliked the film are basing their reviews on what they \"thought\" should have happened in the movie or how they thought the story should go. However\, that is not really a review of the film\, it is a statement of discomfort for Star Wars to tread on unfamiliar territory as this film is not afraid to explore new avenues in the Star Wars galaxy. Overall\, the film itself is a stand alone work of art. There is action\, humor\, drama\, romance\, and a whole lot of sci-fi adventure. Throughout the film\, you can vividly see there is a lot of Empire Strikes Back influence. If you go into this film objectively\, not expecting it has to be a certain way or characters have to be related in certain manners\, then you will see that this indeed a fantastic science fiction space thriller from beginning to the end. Star Wars The Last Jedi should not even come close to being rated less than 5 stars.
